about.story: eSync was born from frustration. Our founder, Rennie Kawangu, visited schools across Zambia and witnessed incredible educators struggling with outdated systems‚Äîor no systems at all. Teachers spent hours on paperwork instead of preparing lessons. Administrators manually tracked fees with spreadsheets prone to errors. Parents had no way to know their children's progress.
about.storyPart2: He realized Zambia didn't need expensive international software built for wealthy schools in developed countries. It needed a solution designed specifically for Zambian schools‚Äîone that works on any device, survives on slow internet, respects tight budgets, and solves real problems. eSync was born.

faq.question: How secure is my school's data with eSync?
faq.answer: Security is our top priority. All data is encrypted end-to-end, stored on secure cloud servers, and backed up automatically. We comply with international data protection standards and conduct regular security audits. Your data is never shared with third parties without explicit consent.

faq.question: What happens if internet goes down?
faq.answer: eSync is designed for low-connectivity environments. But its an online wed application

faq.question: How long does it take to set up eSync?
faq.answer: Initial setup takes just few hours for registration. Data import usually happens same-day, provided the data is in the correct format. Full training and configuration takes 2-3 days. You can start using eSync immediately while we handle the rest. Our team guides you through every step.

faq.question: Can I import existing student and staff data?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We accept data in Excel, CSV, and other common formats. Our team handles the import process to ensure accuracy. We can typically import data for 1,000+ students within hours. No manual re-entry needed.

faq.question: What if my school has custom requirements?
faq.answer: We offer Enterprise plans with custom features and integration capabilities. Our development team can work with your school to build specific solutions. Contact our support team to discuss your unique needs.

faq.question: How is eSync different from international school management systems?
faq.answer: eSync is built specifically for Zambian schools. It understands local curriculum requirements, Zambian fee structures, and works perfectly on low-bandwidth connections common in Zambia. Plus, it's more affordable than international alternatives.

faq.question: Can multiple users access the system simultaneously?
faq.answer: Yes! eSync supports unlimited concurrent users. Teachers, admin, parents, and students can all access the system at the same time. Role-based access ensures everyone sees only what they're supposed to see.

faq.question: What training do teachers and staff receive?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive training including live sessions, video tutorials, and documentation. Our support team conducts on-site or online training for all staff. You also get a dedicated account manager during your first month.

faq.question: What devices can parents and students use to access eSync?
faq.answer: eSync works on any device with a web browser: computers, tablets, and smartphones. The interface is fully responsive and optimized for phones, even older models with limited processing power. Parents don't need to install anything.

faq.question: How do you handle fee payment within eSync?
faq.answer: eSync tracks all fees and payments accurately. We support mobile money integration (Airtel Money, MTN Money, Zamtel) and bank transfers. Parents can see their child's balance anytime. Accounts staff get detailed reports for reconciliation.

faq.question: What if we need to change pricing plans?
faq.answer: Plans are flexible. You can upgrade or downgrade anytime based on your school's needs. If you grow beyond your current plan, we'll adjust seamlessly. No long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

faq.question: How do we contact support if we have issues?
faq.answer: You get 24/7 customer support via email, phone, and WhatsApp. For urgent issues, our support team responds within 2 hours. You also have access to our knowledge base with video tutorials and documentation.
